definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: I am a cup of boiling water, run.
sentences.chinese: 我是一杯白开水，冷暖自知。

sentences.english: Like the days of junior high school love of quiet, like drinking water flowing.
sentences.chinese: 初中的日子像白开水一样爱静地流淌。

sentences.english: In-flight dining options will probably run the gamut from water to water.
sentences.chinese: 飞行过程中的用餐将很可能只有白开水。

sentences.english: To work mothers-to-be, after getting up, drink a glass of fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 要上班的准妈妈们，起床后喝一杯新鲜的白开水。

sentences.english: Drink boiled water, not necessarily very pure.
sentences.chinese: 喝白开水的人，不一定很纯。

sentences.english: I don't even drink a drop of alcohol; I drink only plain water.""Do
sentences.chinese: 我一滴也不喝，我只喝白开水而已。

sentences.english: White boiling water was the most thirst, the truth is the most beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 白开水才最解渴，大实话才最动人。

sentences.english: Please mix with boiled water below 50 deg. c .
sentences.chinese: 请与50℃以下水温的白开水混合。

sentences.english: Drink coffee or tea without sugar, and furthermore, start to.
sentences.chinese: 喝咖啡或茶时不加糖，甚至改喝白开水。

sentences.english: Plain water is fine for staying hydrated during the week.
sentences.chinese: 一周之中白开水可以很好保持水化的。

sentences.english: This is a glass of water, tasteless , right?
sentences.chinese: 这是一杯白开水，平淡无味，对吧？

sentences.english: As for wine, he drank water.

definition: tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
